casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harold BOYD, Jr. No. 239P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of June 2005 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief to Add on to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
